body: Hi, Chris, thank you very much! Now it works. So, i connect a boolean toggle to both the **normByFloorArea** on **Read EP Restuls** and the **normalizeByFloorArea** on **Color Zones** so that the normalization function can be set as on/off for both components at the same time to avoid confusion. Am I correct? Correct viz for issue 1: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OTL0biCLITyraPw6zbPcBvonKCjK4C*zNSJrYas03Hk*NNYCW6bzr68E1PTrvRpA*QEyEZ35nU20lcjnTonxq3x4g-cUAXWW/01.PNG)why one of the zones have different total internal loads is because it has a different floor area (all zones have the same building program, and therefore the same floor area based internal loads definition) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OTL0biCLITzP3zC7uo8qOExkBqfiaH7e*o9TKLcFI8qxuvBImnE6xsNAiwZkxo-sY-4CvZvhOhbJS*dRdOlK2DjPmkIXPujh/03.PNG)once the total zone loads are normalized by floor area, all the zones have the same value now. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OTL0biCLITzP3zC7uo8qOExkBqfiaH7e*o9TKLcFI8qxuvBImnE6xsNAiwZkxo-sY-4CvZvhOhbJS*dRdOlK2DjPmkIXPujh/03.PNG) correct viz for issue 2: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OTL0biCLITzzgyBqJ1zs0fl1rHF*tZrJZ7qV4uZ3nfKJzbV7yaPGF9lTI2t49vTTJxKVj-hv1PEL7B82HqXgAciSLjyClY43/04.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OTL0biCLITzyDDHT6UOxqFAhqMlPVi*doyzf7Kvl9ySB*usa*qJVgablm7LYN6kzwB0FKy5dJcygjHZb8yE3xb1r2siCEn0Z/05.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OTL0biCLITwPLl7kid*ShhMnYTPVFz7SrBrgcsds7jr3sldJmilganPs*NjTCXUD2IHrVC80JKM9ATJgqcSwPBMxj2r6Xtb0/06.PNG)
